hero.title: Hey, I'm <pink>Abdurauf</pink> - <block>Frontend Developer</block>
hero.firstSubtitle: <bold>Crafting Engaging</bold> and <bold>Dynamic User Experiences</bold> with Modern Frontend Development

about.title: About
about.subtitle: Introduction
about.description: Frontend Developer based in Tashkent, Uzbekistan, with expertise in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, and React. Skilled in both team collaboration and independent work, I deliver high-quality, user-focused solutions. Committed to continuous learning and applying my skills to impactful, real-world products with a strong work ethic and results-driven approach.

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: My work
projects.description: The following projects highlight my skills and experience through real-world examples. Each includes a brief description, along with links to code repositories and live demos. They demonstrate my ability to solve complex problems, work with diverse technologies, and manage projects effectively.

imovies.title: iMovies
imovies.description: Movie app built with React & TS which allows users to search and view the trailer of both movies and TV series.

lofi.title: Lofi
lofi.description: Lofi website has background music, rain and other sounds. It provides todo list and pomodoro timer.

lumia.title: Lumia Landing Page
lumia.description: Lumia landing page clone with html, css, bootstrap and javascript.

weather.title: Weather App
weather.description: Web App to get current day weather and seven days forecast. It allows to search cities and get weather from API.

todo.title: Todo App
todo.description: Web App created with react and typescript. It lets you add task to list, remove and edit it.

userManagement.title: User management webapp
userManagement.description: User management fullstack webapp. You can see, delete and block registered users.

rsCV.title: CV RS School
rsCV.description: Website about myself and my skills. Used html, scss and typescript. This is task from RS School.

colorGen.title: Random Color Generator
colorGen.description: Website that you can change colors randomly and, simple colors and hex colors.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Get in touch
